Item ID3239

Bark can be obtained by players with 45 Woodcutting by cutting a hollow tree, which are found east of Canifis and south of Port Phasmatys granting 82.5 Woodcutting experience for each obtained bark.

Bark is a raw material of Splitbark armour that must be given along with pieces of fine cloth and coins to Wizard Jalarast in the Wizards' Tower to create each item.

11 bark is needed to purchase or craft a full set of splitbark equipment.

'''Bark''' can be obtained by players with 45 [[Woodcutting]] by cutting a [[hollow tree]], which are found east of [[Canifis]] and south of [[Port Phasmatys]] granting 82.5 Woodcutting [[experience]] for each obtained bark.

Bark is a raw material of [[Splitbark armour]] that must be given along with pieces of [[fine cloth]] and [[coins]] to [[Wizard Jalarast]] in the [[Wizards' Tower]] to create each item.

11 bark is needed to purchase or craft a full set of splitbark equipment.
